title: Missing PDF Metadata
body:
### Description

It appears that in later releases of skia, more items were added to the metadata class, but this was not translated into the C# equivalent. Also, the `dpi` parameter of the `CreatePdf` overloads were removed (because they were added to the metadata), but never actually added to the metadata.

> VS bug [#732193](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/732193)
